Arrival of Cuban refugees on flight 1511 in Miami, Florida					Written on verso: "Kneeling and thanking providence for his safe arrival in the United States, a Cuban refugee shares with 306, 425 others, the feel of freedom. Airlifted to Miami, Florida on U.S. chartered twice daily - Monday through Friday - planes since December 1, 1965, these refugees will quickly follow others to tearful but joyous family reunions. Witnessing the arrival of flight 1511 are left to right: Mr. George Saxon, Management Systems Division Director, Mr. Emanuel M. Silverman, Assistant Administrator for Administration, and Mr. Howard H.
